What is the default height from which the `rescanfromheight` command starts rescanning if no height is specified?
If no height is specified, the `rescanfromheight` command defaults to 0, which means it will start rescanning from the beginning of the blockchain.

rescanfromheight (height) Rescans the current wallet from a specified height Arguments: 1. "height"   (int, optional) Defaults to 0, height to start rescanning from Note: This call can take minutes or even hours to complete on very large wallets and rescans Examples: Initiate rescan of entire chain > verus rescanfromheight Initiate rescan from block 1000000 > verus rescanfromheight 1000000
